title.rendered: How Much is a Boiler Service in Colchester?

content.rendered:
When it comes to keeping your home warm and comfortable during the cold winter months, a reliable boiler is essential. A boiler service in Colchester can help ensure that your boiler is running efficiently and safely, and can help you avoid costly repairs and breakdowns. But how much does a boiler service cost in Colchester?

The Cost of a Boiler Service in Colchester

The cost of a boiler service in Colchester can vary depending on the type of boiler you have, the size of your home, and the complexity of the service. Generally, a boiler service in Colchester will cost between £50 and £150. It is important to note that the cost of a boiler service can also vary depending on the company you choose to carry out the service.

What is Included in a Boiler Service?

A boiler service in Colchester typically includes a full inspection of the boiler and its components, as well as a safety check to ensure that the boiler is running safely and efficiently. The service will also include a check of the boiler’s pressure, temperature, and water levels, as well as a check of the boiler’s flue and ventilation.

What are the different types of service do Elementis offer?

There are 3 different types of boiler service that we offer as a company;

A boiler safety check which includes a analyser test to confirm the boiler is burning correctly and a gas rate to confirm if the boiler burning the correct amount of gas this is £70 plus vat

A standard boiler service which includes all of the above but we re pressurise the expansion vessel, clean the condense trap, vacuum the case and we charge £80 plus vat

A full stripdown boiler service includes all of the above but we remove the top of the heat exchanger and pour water down it to clear any built up carbon, we also clean the electrodes and flame rectification if a replacement isn't required. This is recommended by most manufactures to be done every 5 years and we charge £100 plus vat plus parts such as seals and gaskets if required.

The Benefits of a Boiler Service

A boiler service in Colchester can help ensure that your boiler is running safely and efficiently, and can help you avoid costly repairs and breakdowns. A boiler service can also help to identify any potential problems before they become more serious, and can help to extend the life of your boiler.

Conclusion

A boiler service in Colchester can help to ensure that your boiler is running safely and efficiently, and can help you avoid costly repairs and breakdowns. The cost of a boiler service in Colchester can vary depending on the type of boiler you have, the size of your home, and the complexity of the service, but typically will cost between £50 and £150.
